knimeNode.name: DB Select Table (Interactive)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node allows the user to select a table via dropdowns rather than knowing the exact table / schema name

fullDescription.intro:
The user can select the table type, schema name and table name. The dropdowns are re-populated dynamically on changing a selection in the table type or schema options
This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com
fullDescription.option: The name of the table to use
Should the schema name be included in the SQL output? excluding the schema name results in more readable SQL at the risk of execution failure

ports.outPort: Database table connection with the table as selected in the node dialog
